column4: hi guys.. i have a big problem..  X can't start.. i compiled my intel graphic card driver// how can i reinstall my intel graphic card driver from ubuntu archives? i replaced all my /usr/lib/xorg/modules files.. but it sucked.. how can i unduo this?
your first lesson in not ****ing with the package management system. you may need to do an install again
it depends... you could try re-installing the packages that own those files, but they may not uninstall cleanly because of your changes, so it'll be hard
